reference.title: XML Templates
reference.shortdesc: Templates are available to provide users with two different XML document templates for quick convenience.

section.title: Simple XML Template
section.p: We have provided a simple XML document that contains two chapters/sections and a preliminary index. You can open it in any XML compatible application (e.g. oXygen, Textedit, Textwrangler, etc.).

We have commented out instructions within the XML document. For example, we have identified three different options available in the index -- indexing terms, subsection, and cross referencing index terms. Each method is found in this template.
This template is a validated XML document.
